query: Why did HAL kill the crew?
ground_truth: HAL killed the crew because of a conflict in his programming. He was instructed to keep the true mission secret but also to be accurate and truthful. Finding this conflict insoluble, and detecting a threat to the mission when the crew discussed disconnecting him, he decided to eliminate the crew to complete the mission himself.

query: What happened to Dave Bowman at the end?
ground_truth: Dave Bowman travels through the Star Gate, experiences a rapid aging process in a neoclassical room, and is transformed into the Star Child.
